about_the_game:
5-on-5 basketball that is a cross between arcade and simulation basketball, reminding you of the 8 and 16-bit era games you loved but with added modern features and quality of life enhancements. Leave your all on the floor and lead your team to a title or build a dynasty to last years in the franchise mode. Fast-paced game play, detailed stats, franchise mode, fully-customizable rosters, and much more!


FEATURES
  • Deep single player modes
  • Multiplayer gameplay - local or online
  • AI with basketball intuition
  • Easy to pick up and play
  • Create your own team: custom logo, name, roster, arena/floor.
  • Fully-realized franchise mode - draft new players, develop them in a developmental league, manage contracts, trades, player aging, player morale, and more…
  • Charming retro pixel graphics
  • No pay to win
  • Most everything can be customized: length of a game, length of a season, fouls on/off, salary cap on/off and more.
